personalEfficiency.title: Efficiency
personalEfficiency.description: Increase chunk of work completion by click.

personalMoneyPerTask.title: Money per task
personalMoneyPerTask.description: Increase money rewards per completed task by 20%

personalTasksCreation.title: Batch tasks creation
personalTasksCreation.description: The + Task button creates 10 tasks per upgrade level instead of only 1.

taskPairing.title: Pairing
taskPairing.description: Allows you to help on tasks already assigned to an assistant.

FIRE.title: Retire early
FIRE.description: You can take a break now... enjoy what you accomplished and be free.

Billions.title: Fire, as in, set the world on fire!
Billions.description: You have billions to burn... burn the world down with it.

secondChance.title: Second chance
secondChance.description: Send all expired or rejected tasks back to the To Do column.

buyAssistants.title: New Assistant
buyAssistants.description: Hire a new assistant to help you complete tasks.

assistantsMultitasking.title: Multitasking
assistantsMultitasking.description: Assistants can take on more tasks at once.

assistantEfficiency.title: Efficiency
assistantEfficiency.description: Increase chunk of work completion rate.

bossAssistant.title: All hands on deck
bossAssistant.description: Assistants can help on review tasks.

buyBoss.title: Get a Boss
buyBoss.description: Hire a new boss to help you create and review tasks.

increaseDifficulty.title: Increase difficulty
increaseDifficulty.description: Increase difficulty of tasks by 1 and reward $ by 100%.

requiresReview.title: Requires review
requiresReview.description: Increase number of tasks that require review after completion by 20%. Reward is tripled.

promotion.title: Promotion
promotion.description: Get a promotion and get a raise of 100% of base salary.

hasDeadline.title: Has deadline
hasDeadline.description: Triples $ reward but tasks will expire after a while.

bossMultitasking.title: Multitasking
bossMultitasking.description: Boss can review more tasks at once.

bossInterval.title: Moar!
bossInterval.description: Increase Boss tasks generation and reviews speed by 5%.
